sarame athi wasinam pahasuwen keti welawak thuladi andaganimata ho galawimata hakiwima, muthra kirime pahasuwa, samastha sharirayema sisil sulan labime ayithiya thahawuru kirima, sarame sita wena andumakata ho wena andumaka sita saramata maru wimedi pitasthara aawaranayaka pihita anawashya wim (mehidi kala yuththe sarame ihala kelawara katin sapagena saramen niruwatha wasa ganna atharama sarama andima sandaha anith anduma galawima ho anith anduma andina thek sarama aawaranayak lesa ho bhawitha kirimaya.mehidi sarama dwithwa kriyawak karayi.), kuda daruwan nalawimata bhawitha kala haki wima (me nisa gamwala kanthawo siya swami purushayanwa saram andimata dirimath karawathi.), kasapatakawa ganimen amudayak lesa andiya haki nisa gaswalata nagimatada bhawitha kala haka.wahama gataya kada dama nawatha sarama lesa andiya haki nisa sarama horapol kadannange nila anduma lesada bhawitha we.baswala gaman karana jaki chanla ha mayikal jaksanla da saramen mahangu pala nela ganithi.

kese wethath dan ee nisa 'agawinisuruwariyata erehiwa idiripathwa athi doshabhiyoga yojanawa pilibandawa puwathak palakirima sambandhayen karunu wimasima sandaha ‚Äòdinamina‚Äô puwathpathe pradhana karthruwaraya ha eeta adala siyaludena parlimenthuwa hamuwata kandawana bawa kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mahatha parlimenthuwedi eeye (16) prakasha keleya.'
